examples: "What if a bunch of scuba divers nosed about here?" / " Curtains for them, when our side-scan sonar sees them."
labels: in reference to curtains closing at the end of a stage show
definitions.label_groups: figuratively , in reference to curtains closing at the end of a stage show

definitions.definition: A ring of clear liquid , forming into drops , near the top of a glass of fortified wine ; the result of differential evaporation of alcohol and subsequent changes in surface tension ; an example of the Marangoni effect .

main_definition: ( figuratively , in reference to curtains closing at the end of a stage show ) An end or death .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , oenology ) A ring of clear liquid , forming into drops , near the top of a glass of fortified wine ; the result of differential evaporation of alcohol and subsequent changes in surface tension ; an example of the Marangoni effect .
